name: jaine-custom
description: JAINE custom plugins - vendor analysis, automation, and AI workflows

plugins.name: vendor-analyzer
plugins.description: Exhaustive vendor codebase analysis with 5-agent pipeline generating Obsidian-compatible documentation vault

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Git workflow automation with skills: changelog generation (ISO 8601, clickable links, code verification, Mermaid diagrams)

plugins.name: jhookify
plugins.description: Enhanced hookify: Claude-visible warnings (additionalContext), block reasons (permissionDecisionReason), global rules, UserPromptSubmit fixes
